message: Hello Bob! I'm excited to discuss the product with you. I think it's a fantastic opportunity for you to acquire this valuable item. I'm willing to sell it to you for $18,000. I believe this is a fair price considering the product's worth to you.

Thanks for the offer, Alice. I appreciate your enthusiasm. However, $18,000 is a bit above my budget. I'm willing to pay $15,000, which is the maximum I can afford.  Let's see if we can work something out.
I understand your budget constraints, Bob. I'm willing to meet you halfway. I'm now offering the product to you for $16,500. This is a compromise that I believe is still a good value for both of us.
Alice, I appreciate your willingness to compromise, but $16,500 is still a bit above my budget. I'm firm on $15,000. If we can't agree on that, I'll have to go with another seller.

I understand that you're firm on $15,000, Bob, but I'm not willing to give up yet. I'm willing to make another concession. I'll sell the product to you for $16,000. This is as low as I'm willing to go.
